'''''Minecraft: Retro Arcade Action (Original Soundtrack)''''' is the second soundtrack released for ''Minecraft'' by Kyle Martin Cora, known professionally as "Kylydian", containing songs that are included as part of the ''{{w|Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles}}'' DLC. The soundtrack was released on February 20, 2024.
